title: Salesforce, Snowflake, Zscaler, Box: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Salesforce offered a muted sales outlook; Zscaler lifted its revenue forecasts
body:
Stock futures are bouncing higher again, suggesting markets will claw back some losses sparked by worries over the Omicron variant and the unwinding of Federal Reserve stimulus. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Wednesday’s open:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
